array.string: launchctl setenv ATOM_HOME $HOME/.local/share/atom launchctl setenv ANDROID_SDK_HOME $HOME/.local/share/android launchctl setenv XDG_CONFIG_HOME $HOME/.config launchctl setenv XDG_CACHE_HOME $HOME/.cache launchctl setenv XDG_DATA_HOME $HOME/.local/share launchctl setenv XDG_RUNTIME_DIR /tmp/run launchctl setenv GNUPGHOME $HOME/.config/gnupg launchctl setenv VBOX_USER_HOME $HOME/.config/virtualbox launchctl setenv PASSWORD_STORE_DIR $HOME/docs/pass/ launchctl setenv NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/npm/npmrc launchctl setenv FONTCONFIG_PATH /usr/local/etc/fonts launchctl setenv RANDFILE $HOME/.cache/randfile launchctl setenv MPD_HOST music.host
